code: public Exchange aggregate(Exchange oldExchange, Exchange newExchange) {     if (oldExchange == null) {         return newExchange.     }     String oldBody = oldExchange.getIn().getBody(String.class).     String newBody = newExchange.getIn().getBody(String.class).     oldExchange.getIn().setBody(oldBody + "+" + newBody).     return oldExchange. }

comment: /**  * An expression used to determine if the aggregation is complete  */
code: /**  * An expression used to determine if the aggregation is complete  */ public boolean isCompleted(@ExchangeProperty(Exchange.AGGREGATED_SIZE) Integer aggregated) {     if (aggregated == null) {         return false.     }     return aggregated == 3. }
